meanings.definition: Containing or resembling a mixture of oil and resin.
meanings.sent1: The oleoresinous paint had a shiny and sticky appearance.
meanings.sent2: The artist used an oleoresinous varnish to protect the wooden sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The oleoresinous tree sap made the squirrel's paws stick together comically.
meanings.sent4: The oleoresinous aroma of the pine forest enveloped the hikers in a fragrant embrace.
meanings.sent5: The oleoresinous texture of the balm felt smooth and tacky on my skin.

meanings.definition: A substance that is a mixture of oil and resin.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter used an oleoresinous adhesive to join the pieces of wood together.
meanings.sent2: The old painting was restored using an oleoresinous compound to preserve its colors.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the oleoresinous mixture, creating a sticky mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The ancient scroll was sealed with an oleoresinous substance to protect it from decay.
meanings.sent5: The scientist analyzed the oleoresinous sample under the microscope to identify its components.
